content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a cassation case that took place on september 9th 2021 the court ruled that a spouse who contributes to the enhancement of a property during the marriage may be entitled to compensation for their efforts in this specific case the plaintiffs renovation and embellishment of the family home led to a capital gain of 90000 euros the court concluded that the plaintiffs assets owe compensation to the matrimonial property in the amount of 90000 euros the case was referred to the court of appeal for further consideration the plaintiff in the appeal is mr fgh represented by mr m a lawyer from the court of cassation the defendant in the appeal is mrs cgh the court does not provide information about the facts of the case the parties got married in 1981 filed for divorce in 2005 and the court granted the divorce in 2006 the court ordered the division of their joint property and appointed a notary to handle the process the court of appeal partially reversed the judgment and referred the case back to the estate notary the plaintiff raised a single plea of cassation challenging the assessment of compensation the court of cassation set aside the judgment and referred the case back to another court of appeal
